name: ONE DAY GAME #002 - Super Moth Bros
name_original: ONE DAY GAME #002 - Super Moth Bros
description:
I made this game in a One Day, Game Jam-style video for my YouTube channel (video coming out soon). This is the first of many and hopefully they can only get better.

In this game you solve puzzles by switching between the moth and caterpillar and using their particular skills. It's pretty straight forward there is no way to lose... unless you give up. One of the three rooms is a misdirect.

If you play it, let me know what you think!
